events.name: Russia launches fresh drone and missile strikes on Ukraine
events.wd_label: Russia launches fresh drone and missile strikes on Ukraine
events.wd_description: Russia launched new waves of drones and missile strikes on Ukraine, with explosions heard in Kyiv and five people injured in what was described as the most significant kamikaze drone attack so far.
events.description: Russia launched new waves of drones and missile strikes on Ukraine, with explosions heard in Kyiv and five people injured in what was described as the most significant kamikaze drone attack so far.

events.name: Details of the attack
events.wd_description: The attack by Russia was launched shortly after midnight and lasted for over four hours, with Iranian-made Shahed kamikaze drones seen across the country.
events.description: The attack by Russia was launched shortly after midnight and lasted for over four hours, with Iranian-made Shahed kamikaze drones seen across the country.

events.name: Kyiv's response
events.wd_description: The Mayor of Kyiv, Vitaliy Klitschko, confirmed that close to 60 drones were launched by Russia, making it the most significant attack of such kind. Emergency services responded after drone wreckages fell on a runway at Khuliany international airport.
events.description: The Mayor of Kyiv, Vitaliy Klitschko, confirmed that close to 60 drones were launched by Russia, making it the most significant attack of such kind. Emergency services responded after drone wreckages fell on a runway at Khuliany international airport.

events.name: Injuries and damages
events.wd_description: Five people were injured in Kyiv during the attack, with drone wreckages causing damage at Khuliany international airport.
events.description: Five people were injured in Kyiv during the attack, with drone wreckages causing damage at Khuliany international airport.

events.name: Announcement by Ukrainian President
events.wd_description: The President of Ukraine announced that May 9 would be celebrated as Europe Day.
events.description: The President of Ukraine announced that May 9 would be celebrated as Europe Day.

events.name: Wagner mercenary troops leave Rostov-on-Don
events.wd_description: Troops from the Wagner mercenary group started leaving Rostov-on-Don less than 24 hours after attempting a rebellion, following their chief's order to return to Ukraine to avoid bloodshed.
events.description: Troops from the Wagner mercenary group started leaving Rostov-on-Don less than 24 hours after attempting a rebellion, following their chief's order to return to Ukraine to avoid bloodshed.

events.name: Agreement to de-escalate
events.wd_description: The agreement to de-escalate came after Belarusian leader Alexander Lukashenko held talks with Wagner Group's chief, Yevgeny Prigozhin.
events.description: The agreement to de-escalate came after Belarusian leader Alexander Lukashenko held talks with Wagner Group's chief, Yevgeny Prigozhin.

events.name: Charges against Prigozhin dropped
events.wd_description: Charges against Yevgeny Prigozhin will be dropped, and he will move to Belarus as part of the agreement.
events.description: Charges against Yevgeny Prigozhin will be dropped, and he will move to Belarus as part of the agreement.

events.name: Putin's whereabouts
events.wd_description: Despite reports of Russian President Putin leaving Moscow, his press secretary, Dmitry Peskov, confirmed that the president was still in the Kremlin.
events.description: Despite reports of Russian President Putin leaving Moscow, his press secretary, Dmitry Peskov, confirmed that the president was still in the Kremlin.

events.name: Missile strike on medical clinic in Dnipro
events.wd_label: Missile strike on medical clinic in Dnipro
events.wd_description: A missile strike hit a medical clinic in Dnipro, resulting in two deaths and 23 injuries. 21 of the injured are in the hospital, with three in critical condition.
events.description: A missile strike hit a medical clinic in Dnipro, resulting in two deaths and 23 injuries. 21 of the injured are in the hospital, with three in critical condition.

events.name: Details of the strike
events.wd_description: The strike on the medical clinic in Dnipro killed two people and injured 23 others, with firefighters seen trying to control the flames at the scene.
events.description: The strike on the medical clinic in Dnipro killed two people and injured 23 others, with firefighters seen trying to control the flames at the scene.

events.name: Intensified Russian attacks
events.wd_description: Russia has intensified its attacks on Ukraine ahead of an expected counteroffensive from Ukraine.
events.description: Russia has intensified its attacks on Ukraine ahead of an expected counteroffensive from Ukraine.

events.name: Zelensky's response
events.wd_description: Ukrainian President Zelensky posted a video of the damaged clinic, showing firefighters working to control the flames.
events.description: Ukrainian President Zelensky posted a video of the damaged clinic, showing firefighters working to control the flames.

events.name: Ukrainian defense actions
events.wd_description: Ukrainian authorities confirmed they shot down 17 missiles and 31 drones launched by Russia overnight.
events.description: Ukrainian authorities confirmed they shot down 17 missiles and 31 drones launched by Russia overnight.

events.name: Verkor supplying lithium batteries for Alpine C-Crossover GT
events.wd_label: Verkor supplying lithium batteries for Alpine C-Crossover GT
events.wd_description: Verkor will be supplying lithium batteries for the Alpine pure electric C-Crossover GT from its gigafactory in France starting in 2025.
events.description: Verkor will be supplying lithium batteries for the Alpine pure electric C-Crossover GT from its gigafactory in France starting in 2025.

events.name: Renault's investment in Verkor
events.wd_description: Since Renault made its investment in Verkor, the two companies have worked together at the Verkor Innovation Centre (VIC) in Grenoble to approve the technical quality and commercial production process of the battery products.
events.description: Since Renault made its investment in Verkor, the two companies have worked together at the Verkor Innovation Centre (VIC) in Grenoble to approve the technical quality and commercial production process of the battery products.

events.name: Dunkirk gigafactory production
events.wd_description: Verkor will be supplying batteries from its Dunkirk gigafactory.
events.description: Verkor will be supplying batteries from its Dunkirk gigafactory.
